channel.title: SSRN on ScholCommsProd
channel.description: Recent content in SSRN on ScholCommsProd

item.title: SSRN and Elsevier
item.description: So Elsevier has bought SSRN, a private company that fills a role for many academics that is an exemplar of the power and utility of a true commons for scholarship. There is much wringing of hands, gnashing of teeth, and the obligatory call for the community to pony up and create a true open piece of infrastructure. Well, it turns out building things is pretty hard, and building things that people will actually use is even harder.
